Why you absolutely should avoid Now

It's not a multi-purpose programming language

It's not even a programming language!

It occupies a gray area between a shell, maybe a Makefile and a real programming language

What follows is a sample Now document: 

    [Sample Document]
    reference "http://github.com/now-run/now"

    This document serves as a sample for the
    format/language.

    [commands/run]

    # This command simply runs the program title and description
    print "# $($text . title)"
    print ($text . description)

    print "Every section starting with capital letters are"
    print "included inside \$text."
